proper noun.description: (1958–2016), US singer, songwriter, and musician; born Prince Rogers Nelson. Known for his distinctive fusion of funk, rock, and dance music as well as his flamboyant dress and highly sexual lyrics, he achieved international fame in the 1980s with songs like Purple Rain (1984), When Doves Cry (1984), and Kiss (1986).

origin: Middle English: via Old French from Latin princeps, princip- first, chief, sovereign, from primus first + capere take.
